channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish and trash littered across Alscot Way, 8th February
item.description:
Large amount of rubbish and litter strewn across green area behind Alscot Way bins and next to Ros Stark House. Please have a team litter pick and clean this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alscot Way, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shooters hill rd, 8th February
item.description:
Large and dangerous holes in the Rd all the way up from Woodlands farm to Shrewsbury Lane.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shooters Hill, Plumstead

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Food waste feeding pigeons attracting vermin, 8th February
item.description:
Food waste from the 2nd or 3rd floor window of Rhodes house is being thrown onto the communal green area at the back of the building, which is attracting hundreds of pigeons, rats and foxes. Grass is getting trampled and destroyed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Provost Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed drains causing trip hazard, 8th February
item.description:
The drain grills have collapsed and others are unstable, causing a trip hazard. This needs to be made safe to avoid injury or fatality outside the very busy Waterloo train station .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cab Road, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant fly tipping, 8th February
item.description:
I have reported fly tipping here for years now and it’s still happening. The council don’t seem to be doing anything about it more needs to be done to stop this. It’s not fair on all the residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Conway Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leaking out of road, 8th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roper Street, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 24inch wide, 5inch deep pothole outside 11/13 faraday avenue, by school entrance, 8th February
item.description:
The pothole is in the middle of the road. 2 bus routes go along this road and, due to cars parking on the road, the buses are forced into the centre of the road, making them go over the pothole. The resulting noise is extremely loud for the local houses, and vibrations can be felt
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Faraday Avenue, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
